data.message:
it was the one of the most boring speeches i listened to, not only that but not very well presented considering the money facebook have, and finally i honestly believe that emailing via facebook is not a good idea. I have a theory that because of the members of facebook is so large that personal data can be collated for alternative reasons, it's my belief that we are all being spied on so i'm reluctant to getting too involved were networking sites are concerned.
william king, united kingdom, crosby, liverpool
